overview: Something funny is going on in the Hobb house. The daughter of his has a chronic masturbation problem. She just can't stop diddling herself while running up phone bills to 900#'s. and now she's using daddy's credit to get male hookers. And what about his other daughter. She's the one going to college. I guess that's why her old high school counselor's cock is wedged up her ass. And what's her step mom doing wielding that strap on. Oh well, at least Mr. Hobbs has those fun trip to Nevada brothels to look forward to. And now his daughter's best friend is moving in. She will definitely need a new father figure.
title: Don't Tell Mommy! 4
